intro: Rondeletia convoluta, commonly known as the spiral vine, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Malvaceae and is characterized by its twining growth habit and showy, tubular flowers. Rondeletia convoluta is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and as a climbing plant.
